title: Rocket Stove
subtitle: Barrel (Designed by Martin Karl Waldenburg, Germany)
about:
A [rocket stove][1] mass heater is an innovative and efficient space
heating system. The following simulation is a barrel model designed by
Martin Karl Waldenburg from Germany. The volume reduction of the fluid
due to the heat loss by the barrel causes an under pressure like a tall
chimney.



[1]: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rocket_stove
